sentences.en: "I ought to reconsider her offer to move in," he mused.
sentences.cn: “我该重新考虑她让我搬去和她一起住的提议，”他思忖着。

sentences.en: Christoffel's major concern was to reconsider and amplify the theme already treated somewhat sketchily by Riemann.
sentences.cn: Christoffel主要关心的是重新考虑和详细论述Riemann已经稍为粗略地讨论过的题目.

sentences.en: He should reconsider his decision to resign.
sentences.cn: 他应该重新考虑辞职的决定。

sentences.en: I earnestly beg you to reconsider your decision.
sentences.cn: 我诚恳地请求你把你的决定再重新考虑一下.

sentences.en: I went to the prison to ask them to reconsider their stubborn conduct.
sentences.cn: 我去监禁他们的地方让他们重新考虑毫不让步的方式.
我将重新考虑我的决定.

sentences.en: If at the end of two years you still feel the same, we will reconsider.
sentences.cn: 如果两年后你还是同样的感觉，我们会重新考虑。

sentences.en: If Lafontaine is forced to climb down, he may wish to reconsider his position.
sentences.cn: 如果拉方丹被迫让步，他可能愿意重新考虑自己的立场。

sentences.en: In your case, we wanted to reconsider that number.
sentences.cn: 就你的情况来说, 我们想要重新考虑这个数目.

sentences.en: Let us reconsider the problem of derangements.
sentences.cn: 让我们重新考虑错位问题.

sentences.en: My standing silent was a way of asking him to reconsider.
sentences.cn: 我默默地站在那里,意思是请求他重新考虑一下.

sentences.en: Richard pleaded for Belinda to reconsider and not to go through with the divorce.
sentences.cn: 理查德恳求贝琳达再考虑一下，别坚持离婚。

sentences.en: The assembly voted to reconsider the bill.
sentences.cn: 议会投票决定复议该案.

sentences.en: The Congress had agreed to reconsider its stance on the armed struggle.
sentences.cn: 国会已同意重新考虑其对武装斗争的态度。

sentences.en: The wrinkled postcard now made me reconsider.
sentences.cn: 此刻这张打皱的明信片却促我重新扪心自问.

sentences.en: We can reconsider lowering our price if your order is big enough.
sentences.cn: 如果你方订货数量大,价格还可以考虑降低.

sentences.en: We want you to come. Please reconsider.
sentences.cn: 我们希望你来，请你重新考虑一下。

trans.tran_en: to think again about something in order to decide if you should change your opinion or do something different
